hudson.tasks.Shell.command: GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7` cd docker/pic-sure-hpds docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . cd ../pic-sure-hpds-etl docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} . cd ../../ mkdir -p docker_image_output cd docker_image_output docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-hpds-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-hpds-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz s3://avillach-datastage-pic-sure-jenkins-dev-builds/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-hpds-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-hpds-etl-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-hpds-etl-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz s3://avillach-datastage-pic-sure-jenkins-dev-builds/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-hpds-etl-${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}.tar.gz
